sentences.sentence: Cries the vengeance, stamping her foot in the chair, and here are the tumbrils.
sentences.translation: 复仇女神在椅子上顿脚大叫，“囚车到了！”

sentences.sentence: On the steps of a church, awaiting the coming-up of the tumbrils, stands the Spy and prison-sheep.
sentences.translation: 在一个教堂的台阶上等着囚车到来的是密探兼监狱绵羊。
